testsuite.name: CoffeeMachineTest
testsuite.system-out: ?[1;31m Start test 1?[0m Starting to make a coffee Grinding coffee beans Boiling water Mixing boiled water with crushed coffee beans Pouring coffee into the cup Pouring some milk into the cup Coffee is ready! Write how many cups of coffee you will need: > 25 For 25 cups of coffee you will need: 5000 ml of water 1250 ml of milk 375 g of coffee beans ?[1;31m Start test 2?[0m Starting to make a coffee Grinding coffee beans Boiling water Mixing boiled water with crushed coffee beans Pouring coffee into the cup Pouring some milk into the cup Coffee is ready! Write how many cups of coffee you will need: > 125 For 125 cups of coffee you will need: 25000 ml of water 6250 ml of milk 1875 g of coffee beans ?[1;31m Start test 3?[0m Starting to make a coffee Grinding coffee beans Boiling water Mixing boiled water with crushed coffee beans Pouring coffee into the cup Pouring some milk into the cup Coffee is ready! Write how many cups of coffee you will need: > 1 For 1 cups of coffee you will need: 200 ml of water 50 ml of milk 15 g of coffee beans ?[1;31m Start test 4?[0m Starting to make a coffee Grinding coffee beans Boiling water Mixing boiled water with crushed coffee beans Pouring coffee into the cup Pouring some milk into the cup Coffee is ready!
